title: Vanilla-Free Christmas
description: This Christmas, the best gifts are waiting for those who have been naughty…And the toys under the tree are not for children. Sexy Santas, naughty elves, and dominant shifters are ready to spread some very kinky Christmas cheer. It's a good thing the ladies in our stories are looking for anything but vanilla.Be Warned: ménage sex, anal sex, sex toys, BDSM, spanking
author: Doris O'Connor
